entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
